attributes.action: Lack of confidence in Owen Paterson MP in his ability to do his job
attributes.additional_details:
We the British public no longer have confidence in Owen Paterson MP and he should be removed from his position as Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs.

He has proven to be grossly incompetent in his position, ignoring overwhelming scientific evidence, public opinion and common sense, He is clearly influenced by corporate business and lobbying groups and therefore cannot be impartial in any decisions he makes.

He should be removed with immediate effect before he does irreparable damage to the environment and wildlife of the British countryside through his misguided policies and be replaced with a minister who has a more common sense and impartial view
